column2:
phyloseq_to_df(physeq_obj.step3_counts) %>% 
  dplyr::select(.,-OTU,-Domain,-Phylum, -Class,-Order,-Family,-Genus) %>%
  #remove ASVs without species level ID
  filter(Species != "") %>%
  gather(.,Sample,nReads, `X1996_4_80_60_1_1`:`X2019_4_93.3_60_1_3`, factor_key=TRUE) %>%
  left_join(tech_metadata) %>% 
  dplyr::select(Species,Sample,ext_rep, tech_rep,nReads,Year,Rpt_Line,Rpt_Sta) %>% 
  unite(station_id, c("Year","Rpt_Line", "Rpt_Sta"),remove =FALSE) %>% 
  unite(Site, c("Rpt_Line", "Rpt_Sta"),remove =FALSE) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(station_id,Species) %>%
  #calculate mean and STDEV
  full_join(., viz_plus_egg, by = c("Species" = "Species", "station_id"="station_id")) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  dplyr::select(Species, Sample, ext_rep,tech_rep, station_id, Site,Year, nReads, Abundance, Egg_Abundance,total_biomass) -> eDNA_comp.biomass_egg
